title: Building Community
text: Whether batching orders for your apartment complex or just picking up lovely meals from your neighbors, experience a moment of genuine connections with those around you.

section.title: Healthy Food
section.content: Wholesome, nourishing home-cooked food could be just a click away...and down the block.

section.title: Create Local Opportunity
section.content: Not every talented cook has time or money to open a restaurant - but every one of them can cook for What's Cookin'
